main event: A witness reported seeing a bright object in the sky, described as being brighter than a star, on the night of March 26, 1967 in Willow Grove, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was stationary and had no distinguishing features,It was described as bright fire engine red all over,The observation lasted for approximately 2 seconds,The Air Force indicated that it was likely a meteor based on the description,The report was filed under Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force investigation of UFO sightings.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: A 16-year-old male who reportedly studied UFOs.
